headline: The Bull Case For Valero Energy (VLO) Could Change Following Benicia Shutdown And Venezuelan Crude Shift
summary: Valero Energy recently reported quarterly earnings that exceeded consensus expectations, outlined plans to idle its Benicia refinery by April 2026, and continued advancing low‑carbon investments while preparing to meet tighter biofuel blending rules. At the same time, the company arranged imports of up to 6.5 million barrels of Venezuelan crude for its Gulf Coast refineries, highlighting how supply decisions and regulatory shifts are reshaping its refining footprint and cost structure. With...
